'''Georgii 'Fry' Gavrichev''' is a Software Engineer<ref>https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/credits</ref> at [[Mojang Studios]] who works on ''[[Java Edition|Minecraft: Java Edition]]''. He was announced as a new Mojang team member working on ''Java Edition'' on October 6, 2017.<ref>{{tweet|jeb|916229857255845888|Shoutout for our most recent Minecraft Java Edition developer @fry_su ! Он ответит на все ваши русские вопросы;)|October 6, 2017}}, '''''translation:''' "He will answer all your Russian questions."''</ref>

He has been known for addressing technical lighting issues,<ref>https://bugs.mojang.com/browse/MC-148723?jql=project%20%3D%20MC%20AND%20resolution%20%3D%20Fixed%20AND%20resolved%20%3E%3D%202017-10-06%20AND%20assignee%20in%20(fry)%20AND%20text%20~%20%22lighting%22%20ORDER%20BY%20created%20DESC</ref> maintaining Data Fixer Upper<ref>https://github.com/Mojang/DataFixerUpper/graphs/contributors</ref> and working on Blaze 3D.<ref>{{tweet|SeargeDP|1127929965704622081|As some of you guessed correctly, the last image I posted was about Blaze 3D. An older branch that was parked for a while has been successfully rebased and @fry_su and I will resume work on it soon. There's a lot of work ahead of us, so we'll stick to "when it's done" for now.}}</ref>

Before he joined Mojang Studios, he was known for working on [https://github.com/MinecraftForge/MinecraftForge/pull/2331 a forge API] for modded [[model]]s.<ref>https://github.com/MinecraftForge/MinecraftForge/pulls?q=is%3Apr+author%3ARainWarrior+is%3Aclosed</ref>
